definitions.definition: a particular group of people or things that share similar characteristics and form a smaller division of a larger set:
examples: There were so many different types of bread that I didn't know which to buy.

definitions.definition: a person who seems to represent a particular group of people, having all the qualities that you usually connect with that group:
examples: He doesn't use fully rounded characters in his plays - he uses types.

definitions.definition: to be the type of person that someone thinks is attractive:
examples: He's a nice enough guy - he's just not my type.

definitions.definition: to write using a machine, either a computer keyboard or a typewriter:
examples: She asked me to type a couple of letters.
